description:
An old man has a bump.  A lazy man wants a life of ease.  The God of Wealth`s hammer is missing its handle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kobutori Jii-san / Bunbun Shaku ni Sase / Kozuchi no E
The Old Man and His Bump / Buzz! Buzz! Serve Sake! / The Hammer`s Handle
こぶとり爺さん / ぶんぶん杓にさせ / 小槌の柄
